alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Jones; Lyman (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 2:16PM MST until January 03 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 13 inches, with the highest amounts across the southern parts of these counties. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Jones, Lyman and Buffalo Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
